verses.verse: And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> the <S%H8664>Tishbite,<s%> who was of the <S%H8453>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H256>Ahab,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H5975>stand,<s%> there shall not be <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> but <S%H6310>according<s%> to my <S%H1697>word.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3212>Get<s%> you <S%H2088>hence,<s%> and <S%H6437>turn<s%> you <S%H6924>eastward,<s%> and <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> that is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>
And it shall be, that you shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook;<s%> and I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> to <S%H3557>feed<s%> you <S%H8033>there.<s%>

So he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> by the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3747>Cherith,<s%> that is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

And the <S%H6158>ravens<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in the <S%H6153>evening;<s%> and he drank of the <S%H5158>brook.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H7093>after<s%> a <S%H3117>while,<s%> that the <S%H5158>brook<s%> <S%H3001>dried<s%> up, <S%H3588>because<s%> there <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> in the <S%H776>land.<s%>
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H6965>Arise,<s%> <S%H3212>get<s%> you to <S%H6886>Zarephath,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> belongs to <S%H6721>Zidon,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there:<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> a <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> to <S%H3557>sustain<s%> you.

So he <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H6886>Zarephath.<s%> And when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H6607>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H490>widow<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7197>gathering<s%> of <S%H6086>sticks:<s%> and he <S%H7121>called<s%> to her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Fetch<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> in a <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> that I may <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And as she was <S%H3212>going<s%> to <S%H3947>fetch<s%> it, he <S%H7121>called<s%> to her, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>Bring<s%> me, I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, a <S%H6595>morsel<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

And she <S%H559>said,<s%> As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2416>lives,<s%> I <S%H3426>have<s%> not a <S%H4580>cake,<s%> but an <S%H4393>handful<s%> <S%H3709><s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> in a <S%H3537>barrel,<s%> and a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> in a <S%H6835>cruse:<s%> and, <S%H2005>behold,<s%> I am <S%H7197>gathering<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6086>sticks,<s%> that I may <S%H935>go<s%> in and <S%H6213>dress<s%> it for me and my <S%H1121>son,<s%> that we may <S%H398>eat<s%> it, and <S%H4191>die.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H3372>Fear<s%> not; <S%H935>go<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> as you have <S%H559>said:<s%> but <S%H6213>make<s%> me <S%H8033>thereof<s%> a <S%H6996>little<s%> <S%H5692>cake<s%> <S%H7223>first,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> it to me, and <S%H314>after<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> for you and for your <S%H1121>son.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> The <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> shall not <S%H3615>waste,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2637>fail,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>sends<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%> on the <S%H127>earth.<s%>
And she <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>saying<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah:<s%> and she, and he, and her <S%H1004>house,<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> many <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And the <S%H3537>barrel<s%> of <S%H7058>meal<s%> <S%H3615>wasted<s%> not, <S%H3808>neither<s%> did the <S%H6835>cruse<s%> of <S%H8081>oil<s%> <S%H2638>fail,<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> by <S%H452>Elijah.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things,<s%> that the <S%H1121>son<s%> of the <S%H802>woman,<s%> the <S%H1172>mistress<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> fell <S%H2470>sick;<s%> and his <S%H2483>sickness<s%> was <S%H3966>so<s%> <S%H2389>sore,<s%> that there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5397>breath<s%> <S%H3498>left<s%> in him.

And she <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have I to do with you, O you <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God?<s%> are you <S%H935>come<s%> to me to <S%H2142>call<s%> my <S%H5771>sin<s%> to <S%H2142>remembrance,<s%> and to <S%H4191>slay<s%> my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H5414>Give<s%> me your <S%H1121>son.<s%> And he <S%H3947>took<s%> him out of her <S%H2436>bosom,<s%> and <S%H5927>carried<s%> him up <S%H413>into<s%> a <S%H5944>loft,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> he <S%H3427>stayed,<s%> and <S%H7901>laid<s%> him on his own <S%H4296>bed.<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> have you also brought <S%H7489>evil<s%> on the <S%H490>widow<s%> with <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H1481>sojourn,<s%> by <S%H4191>slaying<s%> her <S%H1121>son?<s%>

And he <S%H4058>stretched<s%> himself on the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H7121>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, let <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3206>child's<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> him <S%H7725>again.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H452>Elijah;<s%> and the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of the <S%H3206>child<s%> <S%H7725>came<s%> <S%H5921>into<s%> him <S%H7725>again,<s%> and he <S%H2421>revived.<s%>

And <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3206>child,<s%> and <S%H3381>brought<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> out of the <S%H5944>chamber<s%> into the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5414>delivered<s%> him to his <S%H517>mother:<s%> and <S%H452>Elijah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> your <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H2416>lives.<s%>

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H452>Elijah,<s%> <S%H6258>Now<s%> by <S%H2088>this<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> is <S%H571>truth.<s%>
